item.description:
**If the RSVP is full, please put yourself on the wait list, as I will be opening up more spots as the event date approaches**

We are excited to have our next night life event at Felt! All members are welcome!

Has the weather gotten you down? Don't let winter get in the way of having a great time this Saturday night! We are hitting up Felt, which has a great bar and dance scene, along with 2 floors of billiards. This will be a solid night for meeting people and getting your groove on!

DETAILS: We will meet at 8:30pm at the SECOND FLOOR BAR at Felt (533 Washington St). I encourage everyone to arrive early as the lines will get more crowded as the night progresses. Please look for me to find the group. We will head up to the 4th Floor dance area around 10pm to beat the lines. Cover: None for the bar area, but expect to pay $10 to get into the 4th floor dance area.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

Please dress appropriately as this is an upscale venue. If traveling by T, Boylston is the closest T stop on the green line.

Hope to see you there! Charlie

*The Organizer reserves the right to adjust RSVPs in order to balance out group turnout.*
item.how_to_find_us: My picture is on the left hand side of the web site. Call me for assistance.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Night Life Mixer and Dancing at FELT, This Saturday, Feb. 7!
